title: Android 10 needs to fix battery drain
content:
Battery backup on the Android 10 was a mess.
After downgrading with the help of the Android developer forum, I noticed a huge drop of battery from 75% to 48% immediately after downgrading.
Android 10 seems to have a battery calibration issue rather than a battery drain issue apparantly.
Other than this whole battery issue, Android 10 is a pretty sweet upgrade from pie and I hope this battery issue goes away for good.
Waiting for the next build to roll out soon
